sentences.english: Ever since, the One-Thousand-Angle Light has been out of sight for 37 years.
sentences.chinese: 自此以后，千角灯就在37年间再也没有出现过。

sentences.english: The next day I bought a pair of swim fins and I have been skin diving ever since.
sentences.chinese: 我第二天买了一橡皮脚蹼，自此从事切肤潜水。

sentences.english: Normalization of Sino-U. S. relations was thus achieved.
sentences.chinese: 自此，中美关系实现正常化。

sentences.english: The head of the school has since gone on to lead marketing for the whole group.
sentences.chinese: 自此，新东方的校长就带领他们的团队领跑培训市场。

sentences.english: Eversince, Yi Lie did not trust love anymore.
sentences.chinese: 自此，以烈再也不相信爱情。

sentences.english: Since then it has held conferences biennially with sponsorship from host countries and other parties.
sentences.chinese: 自此，主办国和其他人士每两年便赞助举行该会议。

sentences.english: From that time on, Jacob has had moments of scheming and planning.
sentences.chinese: 自此以后，雅各仍有时在谋算和计划。

sentences.english: Since then-people regarded the Great their Wasl as synonymous with the Chinese n.
sentences.chinese: 从那自此，人们就把长城看作是中华民族的标记。

sentences.english: However , he failed to return and has lost contact with his family since then.
sentences.chinese: 但他并没有回港及自此与家人失去联络。

sentences.english: Finnair operates a total of 74 flights per week to Asia.
sentences.chinese: 自此，芬航在亚洲的总航班量增加到了74班。

sentences.english: More than 90 percent of cheerleaders were female from that point on.
sentences.chinese: 自此以后，超过百分之九十的啦啦队员由女性担当。

sentences.english: Since then, China out of the monarchy into the period of democratic revolution.
sentences.chinese: 自此之后，中国脱离了帝制而转入了民主革命时期。

sentences.english: From now on Wei Force the military authority political power will fall in the Sima hand. (A.
sentences.chinese: 自此曹魏军权政权落入司马氏手中。

sentences.english: And since then, the markets have not bounced back.
sentences.chinese: 自此以后，市场未出现反弹。

sentences.english: This pause for tea became a fashionable social event.
sentences.chinese: 自此之后，茶歇就成了一种社会潮流。

sentences.english: Since then, the Handan area, it left a groom to marry the daughter-in-law to discredit custom face.
sentences.chinese: 自此，邯郸一带，便留下了新郎娶媳妇抹黑脸的风俗。

definition: plain/informal/suitable/convenient/opportune/to urinate or defecate/equivalent to 就[jiu4]: then/in that case/even if/soon afterwards
to continue/to follow after/to go on with/to succeed/to inherit/then/afterwards
(completed action marker)/(modal particle indicating change of state, situation now)/(modal particle intensifying preceding clause)
to finish/to achieve/variant of 瞭|了[liao3]/to understand clearly
one stumble, unable to rise (idiom); a setback leading to total collapse/ruined at a stroke/unable to recover after a minor hitch
